posts.subject: Spam Prevention?
posts.body:
Is there any easy solution to deal with someone using a script that automatically generates a new certificate and spams a board with threads?

Asking for a friend.  Seems there was some initial research done on BTC-based captcha systems but there's very little discussion out in the clearnet.

Is there a way to add say a 5 minute delay between making posts, even?

>>cbe3b812-cfb8-46bc-a6d6-8ac4a4b8ab4f
>disabling self-signed certificates and only allowing ZeroID

How would this be done in the site's main code, and what would users need to do to get a ZeroID?  This sounds like the answer, but I'm just a dedicated amateur at javascript and Zeronet.

>>da28603a-f66a-42e3-9a47-f09204df1227

I figured it out before you replied, but thank you very much nonetheless.
